channel.title: Tensors on Math for Machines
channel.description: Recent content in Tensors on Math for Machines

item.title: A Tour of Tensors
item.description: Here are some notes on tensors, starting from basic linear algebra. I’ve tried to take a computational focus and to avoid formalism when possible. If you’re interested in tensors applied to machine learning, or have wondered why arrays in Tensorflow are called tensors, you might find this useful. I’ll do some computations in Sage and also in Numpy for illustration.
